abstract: Its wireless business had record profit thanks to strong sales of smartphones and the popularity of its new shared data plans, Verizon Communications said.
snippet: Its wireless business had record profit thanks to strong sales of smartphones and the popularity of its new shared data plans, Verizon Communications said.
lead_paragraph: At Verizon Communications, the plan is working. In May, it told investors it hoped to bring in more money from wireless customers with its new shared data plans, which encourage people to pay for more data. Those new plans, and strong smartphone sales, are paying off.

headline.main: Verizon’s Income Increases 15.5% as Sales Climb
headline.print_headline: Verizon’s Income Increases 15.5% as Sales Climb
